Class Environment

java.lang.Object
worldofzuul.world.Environment
public class Environment
extends java.lang.Object
The type Environment. Manages time and weather.

    • rainState

      private final javafx.beans.property.BooleanProperty rainState

    • nightState

      private final javafx.beans.property.BooleanProperty nightState
      The Night state.

    • calendar

      private final java.util.Calendar calendar
      The Calendar.

    • random

      private final java.util.Random random
      The Random. Random generator for randomizing rain events.

    • rainTicksMin

      private int rainTicksMin
      The Rain ticks min. The minimum length of update ticks a burst of rain can last.

    • rainTicksMax

      private int rainTicksMax
      The Rain ticks max. The maximum length of update ticks a burst of rain can last.

    • chanceForRain

      private double chanceForRain
      The Chance for rain.

    • dayTimeStart

      private int dayTimeStart
      The Day time start. The time at which a day is set to start, described in whole hours using a 24H clock.

    • dayTimeEnd

      private int dayTimeEnd
      The Day time end. The time at which a day is set to end, described in whole hours using a 24H clock.

    • secondsToIncrement

      private int secondsToIncrement
      The Seconds to increment. Amount of seconds to increment calendar with per update tick.

    • rainWaterAmount

      private float rainWaterAmount
      The Rain water amount. Amount of water to add every update tick when it is raining.

    • isPrintingEnabled

      private boolean isPrintingEnabled
      The Is printing enabled. If true enable logging of difference in nightstate and rainstate.

    • rainTicks

      private int rainTicks
      The Rain ticks. The amount of update ticks it has rained for.

      public void update()
      Update. Increments time and determines whether it should rain.

    • update

      public void update​(GameObject gameObject)
      Updates a GameObject. If it is raining and the parameter is an instance of Field then water is added to it.
      Parameters:
      gameObject - the game object
